---
title: Sustained Attention
---

Sustained attention refers to the ability to maintain consistent response during a continuous activity

Functional presentation of deficit:

- Difficulty with Details @fellLifespanNeurorehabilitationPatientcentered2019
- Staops a task midway @fellLifespanNeurorehabilitationPatientcentered2019

:::{.callout title="Example"}
Stops doing exercises after 6 reps when asked to do 15 @fellLifespanNeurorehabilitationPatientcentered2019
:::
